item.title: Two million taxpayers to be hit by £100k tax trap by 2026/27
item.description: Frozen thresholds mean more people than ever are set to pay an effective income tax rate of 60% as their earnings increase beyond £100,000. We look at...

item.title: Warning: Covid-era ‘lockdown wills’ at increased risk of legal challenge
item.description: Pressures caused by the pandemic led some people to rush their wills. Now, lawyers are saying problems are surfacing that could make them invalid

item.title: Gilt yields fall to lowest level since 2024
item.description: The cost of government borrowing is falling. A new bond issuing strategy could be helping bring gilt yields down.
